snippet.title: Gal*Gun 2 - Steam Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
If you’ve been gazing enviously at your console brothers, as they bask, unashamedly in the warmth of pantsu paradise, then envy no more! Gal*Gun 2 from PQube Ltd and developers IntiCreates is out TODAY on Steam with a 20% launch discount!

Get Gal*Gun 2 on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/851890/

Following on from Gal*Gun: Double Peace, the smash-hit rail-shooter which replaced grizzled enemies with cute girls, and bullets for pheromones shots, Gal*Gun 2 is back with a vengeance with more than a few new tricks up its sleeve!

Gal*Gun 2 is also available digitally and physically on PS4 and Nintendo Switch across Europe and North America.

Visit the Website here:
http://www.pqube.co.uk/galgun2

Come chat to us on our PQube Discord server! https://discord.gg/xHS7MnU
